name: Bye-Bye, Wacky Planet
description: A fast-paced 2D side-scrolling shooter inspired by the old school video games. Use a wide selection of alien guns to tear through a bunch of enemies to freedom!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: WebGL compatible Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio Additional Notes: Gamepad (XInput, optional), 16:9 aspect ratio (recommended)
